snippet: Interest in new oil and gas exploration in the Gulf of Mexico appears to be waning because of the low price of oil, but federal regulators said they remained optimistic.
abstract: Only 195 bids are placed for oil leases in central parts of Gulf of Mexico, signaling decline in interest in new oil and gas exploration due to low price of oil.
lead_paragraph: Interest in new oil and gas exploration in the Gulf of Mexico appears to be waning because of the low price of oil, but federal regulators said they remained optimistic.

headline.main: Interest in Gulf of Mexico Wanes With Oil Prices
headline.print_headline: Interest in Gulf of Mexico Wanes With Oil Prices
